## Test Case: src/Root.php
+-------------+----------+--------------------- src/Root.php -----------------------------------------------+
| Line:Column | Severity | Message                                                                          |
+-------------+----------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 789         | Error    | Something went wrong #0                                                          |
+-------------+----------+--------------------- src/Root.php -----------------------------------------------+

## Test Case: src/Class.php
+-------------+----------+--------------------- src/Class.php ----------------------------------------------+
| Line:Column | Severity | Message                                                                          |
+-------------+----------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 123:4       | Error    | Something went wrong once again. It's a really really really long-long-long-long |
|             |          | message.                                                                         |
|             |          | Another line.                                                                    |
+-------------+----------+--------------------- src/Class.php ----------------------------------------------+

## Test Case: src/AnotherFile.php
+-------------+----------+------------------ src/AnotherFile.php -------------------------------------------+
| Line:Column | Severity | Message                                                                          |
+-------------+----------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 456         | Warning  | Something                                                                        |
|             |          | went                                                                             |
|             |          | wrong                                                                            |
|             |          |                                                                                  |
|             |          | #2                                                                               |
+-------------+----------+------------------ src/AnotherFile.php -------------------------------------------+

## Test Case: src/SomeFiles.php
+-------------+----------+------------------- src/SomeFiles.php --------------------------------------------+
| Line:Column | Severity | Message                                                                          |
+-------------+----------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 1:1         | Debug    | Failed asserting that two arrays are identical.                                  |
|             |          | --- Expected                                                                     |
|             |          | +++ Actual                                                                       |
|             |          | @@ @@                                                                            |
|             |          |  Array &0 (                                                                      |
|             |          | -    0 => 'asd'                                                                  |
|             |          | +    0 => 123                                                                    |
|             |          | +    1 => 123123                                                                 |
|             |          |  )                                                                               |
+-------------+----------+------------------- src/SomeFiles.php --------------------------------------------+

## Test Case: Undefined Suite Name
+-------------+----------+----------------- Undefined Suite Name -------------------------------------------+
| Line:Column | Severity | Message                                                                          |
+-------------+----------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| 1:1         | Error    | Undefined Error Message                                                          |
+-------------+----------+----------------- Undefined Suite Name -------------------------------------------+
